DOC.brief_summary: Can commercially available vibrate chair increase number urothelial cell urine sample healthy participant non-invasively ? The control group alternate 15 minute drink eight fluid ounce water 15 minute sit non-vibrating chair one hour . Then , urine sample collect examined urothelial cell concentration group .
